name: spadmin
description: SPA rest-to-admin interface RAD-style in vanilla js

scripts.build: cd public/js && minify stateful-event.min.js page.js restful.min.js transparency.min.js nanobar.min.js main.js > ../../dist/spadmin.min.js
scripts.builddev: cd public/js && cat stateful-event.min.js page.js restful.min.js transparency.min.js nanobar.min.js main.js > ../../dist/spadmin.min.js
